channel.title: My First Time Scripts

item.title: My First Time Scripts
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

What? Mouse() clicks, I was talking about moving the mouse, but ya Mouse(x, y, randomx, randomy); is good for clicking.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Time Scripts
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Or better YET, use mouse. Not MMouse.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Time Scripts
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Also, whenever you deal with runescape, always use random. Example

Instead of Wait(500); use Wait(500+random(20)); or instead of MoveMouseSmooth(34, 68); use MoveMouseSmooth(32+random(3), 66+random(3)); Or even better yet for the mouse moving, use the SRL include (if you have it) wich is {.include SRL/SRL.scar} and use this procedure
MMouse(34, 68, 3, 3); The 2 3’s are just for randomness, it means the mouse will move within 3 pixels either way of the first 2 coords.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ScarScape wrote:

Coords won’t work because other people screen size is not as big as yours. You should use bitmaps.

item.title: My First Time Scripts
item.dc:creator: @SCOTTY1 -SCOTTY-
item.description:
@SCOTTY1 wrote:

The List

[ul][li]Auto Runscape Logger[/li]
[li]Stick RPG Date Watcher[/li]
[li]Stick RPG Fitness Watcher[/li][/ul]

-Auto Runescape Logger-
[scar]// |///| -SCOTTY’S- |///| \
// |SCOTTY| Auto Logger |SCOTTY| \
program Autologin;
const
{|///|-Info-|///|}
RuneScapeUsername=(‘Enter Your EuneScape Username Here’);
RuneScapePassword=(‘Enter Your RuneScape Password Here’);
{|///|SCOTTY|///|}

begin
MoveMouseSmooth(468, 291)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(468, 291,true)
wait(500);
Sendkeys(RuneScapeUsername)
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(373, 274)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(373, 274,true)
wait(500);
SendKeys(RuneScapePassword)
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(331, 320)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(331, 320,true)
wait(600);
end.[/scar]

-Sick RPG Date Watcher-
[scar]{**************************************************************}
{ }
{ -SCOTTY’S- }
{ Auto Date Watcher }
{ Hello and thx for using my Auto Fitness Watcher }
{ }
{ Have Fun! }
{ -Credits- }
{ Me }
{ Do0mz }
{**************************************************************}
Program New;

Const
Waittime = 1000;//Leave Me Alone Please (If it gose to fast you may change)

Procedure News;
begin
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(287,231, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);

ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(217,193, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(478,263, true);
end;
Begin
Repeat
News
Until(false)
End.[/scar]

-Stick RPG Fitness Watcher-
[scar]{**************************************************************}
